Welcome! Below are the official PsychGen and NIPH logos available for use in your presentations, reports, or other materials. Please adhere to our guidelines when using these logos. For other logos, please consult Central Station in Teams, the official NIPH [webpage](https://www.fhi.no/om/fhi/visuell-profil/innhold/logo/), the [Lovisenberg Diakonale Sykehus](https://www.lovisenbergsykehus.no/mer-om-oss/logo-og-grafisk-profil/) and [Forskningsrådet](https://identitet.forskningsradet.no/verktoykasse/logo).
